subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Way/Why
msgSnippet: ... It does not, though most of the broadcasters use American accents (of which there are quite a few).  There is no question of there being a standard accent
messageBody:
Sid Tanaban scripsit:

> Is there not the Voice of America,etc., that uses a standard?  

It does not, though most of the broadcasters use American accents (of
which there are quite a few). There is no question of there being a
standard accent across all English-speaking countries.

--

software for all. --Julian Dibbell on Brazil, edited

standard accent across all English-speaking countries.
